0.title: PureFA Alerts Open
0.query:
timeseries purefa_alerts_open = avg(purefa_alerts_open), by: { `dt.entity.purestorage:fa-array` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.purestorage:fa-array`)
| sort arrayAvg(purefa_alerts_open) desc
| limit 20
